/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of vehicles including cars, buses, and motorcycles. The buildings that flank the street are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape.
